welcome_message_body: Welcome to Langenhagen, Germany! Known for its charming atmosphere and friendly people, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. From picturesque parks to delicious cuisine, Langenhagen has something for every traveler. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanover Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hanover Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Finkenwerder Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hildesheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
